title: 115_hr3179
content: Transparency and Accountability for Business Standards Act This bill requires anbsp, federal banking agency tonbsp, publish for notice and comment: (1)nbsp, the agency's rationale for,nbsp. And cost-benefit analysis regarding, the adoption of any prudential regulation that is substantively more stringent than a corresponding international prudential standard. And (2) a proposal for, or the agency's rationale for not proposing, the repeal or amendment of anynbsp. Prudential regulation that is effectively superseded by the implementation of an international prudential standard. A federal banking agency must issue a report regarding any such final rule issued before the bill's enactment and on or after January 1, 2007.
